articles.content: Delhis Indira Gandhi International (IGI) airport has switched to hydro and solar power for its consumption needs from June 1, making it Indias first airport to run entirely on a combination of these … [+2914 chars]

articles.title: ICICI Bank hikes fixed deposit (FD) rates twice in 6 days | Mint - Mint
articles.description: ICICI Bank FD rate: The private lender has raised FD interest rates on term deposits for 185 to less than one year tenors and one year to two year tenors
articles.content: ICICI Bank FD rate: After raising fixed deposit interest rates just six days ago, private lender ICICI Bank has once again raised the FD interest rates for amount below 2 crore. The private bank has … [+1644 chars]

articles.title: Twitter Board approves Elon Musk purchase, CEO Parag Agrawal to get over Rs 300 crore if Musk fires him - India Today
articles.description: Musk had made a hostile bid to take over the company for a $44 billion deal. Of late, Musk hasn't been very sure whether he wants to proceed with the deal or not.
articles.content: Twitter board has unanimously approved Elon Musk acquisition of the micro-blogging site. Musk had made a hostile bid to take over the company for a $44 billion deal.However, it was Musk who was in tw… [+1580 chars]
